item.title: CVE-2023-50832|2023-12-21T17:23:05.986Z -- mondula%20gmbh -- multi%20step%20form
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Mondula GmbH Multi Step Form allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Multi Step Form: from n/a through 1.7.13.
